topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Sample LDAP Server Connection Settings JSON File

p.xref: â–² Integrate the Identity Service (Keystone) with LDAP/AD

body.p: The following is a sample LDAP Server connection settings JSON file with typical values entered. This example is to demonstrate how to complete the JSON values and is not intended for users to copy the values into their cloud.
body.note: This sample file also provides information on how to configure a different LDAP authentication source per directory. This is the first implementation of this new feature in HPE Helion OpenStack and is intended as a Technology Preview targeted at proof of concept deployments.
body.p: See Integrate the Identity Service (Keystone) with LDAP/AD for information on using and modifying this file.
